Name: Frigid Bow
LongDescription: Earns the Pokémon bonus Exp. Points. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Swinub, Piloswine, and Mamoswine.  Finding a Frigid Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
